# Place Your Ko-fi Banner Image Here

Please save your Ko-fi banner image as:
`/Users/zeroq/Stremio-Addons/Balkan On Demand/configure/public/kofi-banner.jpg`

The image from your screenshot should be placed in this location.

Alternatively, run:
```bash
# If you have the image file, copy it here:
cp /path/to/your/kofi-image.jpg "/Users/zeroq/Stremio-Addons/Balkan On Demand/configure/public/kofi-banner.jpg"
```

The React app is configured to display this image prominently on the configuration page.
